description: Tecnología Simeh specializes in innovative, chemical-free technologies across various industries, including dog toys, mining, and organic material processing. The company is a pioneer in Colombia, focusing on natural solutions for environmental cleaning and efficient food extraction. They are launching a line of 100% natural green smoothies aimed at improving health and nutrition. Their unique machinery and processes allow for the production of high-quality powdered foods without losing essential nutrients. The company has established strong relationships with universities and government entities, exporting products to the USA and Europe. Their mission includes setting up global plants to provide affordable, natural food options while promoting sustainable practices in agriculture and aquaculture. Roger emphasizes the importance of independence and innovation in achieving success.
name: Tecnología Simeh
